text.div:
• Include these codes as defined in https://molic-avc.gabriellesantosleandro.com/ValueSet/molicavc-code_healthunit-valueset/
    CodeDisplay
    UBSFPublic Primary Care (CNES - Cadastro Nacional de Estabelecimento Único)
    STROKEHOSPPublic Reference Hospital (CNES - Cadastro Nacional de Estabelecimento Único)
    NONSTROKEHOSPPublic Non-Reference Hospital (CNES - Cadastro Nacional de Estabelecimento Único)
    UPAPublic Emergency Unit (CNES - Cadastro Nacional de Estabelecimento Único)
    SAMUPublic Ambulance (CNES - Cadastro Nacional de Estabelecimento Único)
    REABPublic Rehabilitation Unit (CNES - Cadastro Nacional de Estabelecimento Único)
    OTHERPublic Rehabilitation Unit (CNES - Cadastro Nacional de Estabelecimento Único)
    PRIVATEPrivate Healthcare Service: Other Code

name: MolicAVC_CodeHealthcareUnitValueSet
title: Healthcare Unit Code ValueSet
description:
This ValueSet details codes for healthcare units serving stroke patients in Brazil. 
It includes:
- Public Primary Care: CNES (Cadastro Nacional de Estabelecimento Único)
- Public Reference Hospital: CNES (Cadastro Nacional de Estabelecimento Único)
- Public Non-Reference Hospital: CNES (Cadastro Nacional de Estabelecimento Único)
- Public Emergency Unit: CNES (Cadastro Nacional de Estabelecimento Único)
- Public Ambulance: CNES (Cadastro Nacional de Estabelecimento Único)
- Public Rehabilitation Unit: CNES (Cadastro Nacional de Estabelecimento Único)
- Private Healthcare Service: Other Code.
